mapper.select: SELECT idx,writer,memo,to_char(post_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date FROM memo WHERE memo like '%'||#{search}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT idx,writer,memo,to_char(post_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date FROM memo WHERE ${searchkey} like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into memo ( idx, writer, memo ) values ( (select nvl( max(idx)+1, 1) from memo) , #{writer}, #{memo})
